content.text:
Kryptonite by 3 Doors Down


[Verse 1]
[ch]Bm[/ch]                       [ch]G6[/ch]               [ch]Asus2[/ch]
I took a walk around the world to ease my troubled mind,
[ch]Bm[/ch]                  [ch]G6[/ch]               [ch]Asus2[/ch]
I left my body lyin somewhere in the sands of time.
[ch]Bm[/ch]                               [ch]G6[/ch]               [ch]Asus2[/ch]
I watched the world float to the dark side of the moon,
[ch]Bm[/ch]                          [ch]G6[/ch]  [ch]Asus2[/ch]   
I feel there's nothin I can do,     yeah. 

[Verse 2]
[ch]Bm[/ch]                                [ch]G6[/ch]               [ch]Asus2[/ch]
I watched the world float to the dark side of the moon.
[ch]Bm[/ch]                           [ch]G6[/ch]            [ch]Asus2[/ch]
After all I knew it had to be somethin to do with you.
[ch]Bm[/ch]                        [ch]G6[/ch]               [ch]Asus2[/ch]
I really don't mind what happens now and then,
[ch]Bm[/ch]                       [ch]G6[/ch]           [ch]Asus2[/ch]   
as long as you'll be my friend at the end.

[Refrain]
[ch]Bm[/ch]                      [ch]G6[/ch]                [ch]Asus2[/ch]
If I go crazy then will you still call me superman.
[ch]Bm[/ch]                         [ch]Em[/ch]             [ch]F#m[/ch]
If I'm alive and well will you be there a holdin my hand,
[ch]Bm[/ch]                            [ch]G6[/ch]       [ch]Asus2[/ch] [ch]Bm[/ch]                [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]F#m[/ch]
I'll keep you by my side with my super human might, Kryptonite.

[Verse 3]
[ch]Bm[/ch]                              [ch]G6[/ch]                   [ch]Asus2[/ch]           [ch]Bm[/ch]
You call me strong, you call me weak, but still your secrets I will keep.
                              [ch]Em[/ch]            [ch]F#m[/ch]
You took for granted all the times I never let you down.
[ch]Bm[/ch]                               [ch]G6[/ch]               [ch]Asus2[/ch]
You stumble again and bump your head, if not for me then you'd be dead.
[ch]Bm[/ch]                         [ch]Em[/ch]             [ch]F#m[/ch]
I picked you up and put you back on solid ground.

                                   [ch]D[/ch]
